content: potion bottles - 5 different bottle patterns materials 4mm hook worsted or dk yarn - 4 colors needed - potion color your choice bottle color i used white cork color i used a metallic goldish color yarn tan or brown will also work and chain color i used gold #10 thread but regular yarn will work as well scissors stitch marker & yarn needle terms used single_crochet - single_crochet magic_ring - magic_ring increase - increase fo - fasten_off decrease - decrease flo - front loop only slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain st - stitch if you want your bottle to have more or less potion simply switch to the white later or earlier than the pattern calls for it the cork & chain pattern will be at the end of all the bottle patterns as they are mostly the same pattern for all bottles the sizes of the bottles really depend on the thickness of the yarn you use every bottle starts with the potion color all bottles are worked in the round numbers inside are the stitch count for each round potion bottle #1 - round with short neck approx 5 tall 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 36 7-11 single_crochet around 5 rounds of 36 fo at the end of r11 12 switch to white - single_crochet around 36 13 decrease single_crochet x4 around 30 14 decrease single_crochet x3 around 24 15 decrease single_crochet x2 around 18 16 decrease single_crochet around 12 stuff body of bottle 17-20 single_crochet around 4 rounds of 12 21 single_crochet flo around 12 slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet fo weave in white end do not try to close the hole stuff neck of bottle potion bottle #2 - round with long neck approx 6 tall for potion bottle #2 first you will be repeating rounds 1-16 of bottle #1 stuff body of bottle 17-26 single_crochet around 10 rounds of 12 27 single_crochet flo around 12 slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet fo weave in white end do not try to close the hole stuff neck of bottle potion bottle #3 - wide bottom with long neck approx 5 5 tall 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet x2 around 24 5 increase single_crochet x3 around 30 6 increase single_crochet x4 around 36 7 increase single_crochet x5 around 42 8 increase single_crochet x6 around 48 9-11 single_crochet around 48 fo at end of r11 12 switch to white - single_crochet x6 decrease around 42 13 single_crochet x5 decrease around 36 14 single_crochet x4 decrease around 30 15 single_crochet x3 decrease around 24 16 decrease around 12 stuff body 17-26 single_crochet around 10 rounds of 12 27 single_crochet flo around 12 slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet fo weave in white end do not try to close the hole stuff neck of bottle potion
